Method Detail

createAndShowGUI

private static void createAndShowGUI()
We want to utilized every hardware related to deliver a smoother and stronger experience. We are using DirectX accelerating for Windows, and OpenGL for any other platforms. If the system is not capable of acceleration, we simply doesn't call any acceleration option.
